rules.description: Remap command+q/w to command+h in Google Chrome Dev
Remap command+q/w to command+h in iTerm2
Remap Command+I to Option+Command+I in Google Chrome and Chromium
map niz numpad
Execute scripts with specific key combination.
暂停/播放（ctrl + command + m）
下一曲 ctrl + command + .(>)
上一曲 ctrl + command + ,(<)
cmd + capslock => 打开chatgpt.app
backslash to open Lark.app.
in Lark,backslashx2 to press escape ,then hide Lark.app, ] to open next unread message,[ to open previous unread message
in Lark,tab to  focus on input
option + k to command+k （in）  Lark.app
option + blackslash to backslash
rmd+lcmd to right click,shift+lcmd+rcmd to update subscription
option + m ,shift + option + m to open leetcode cn and leetcode en
option + g option + v to Chrome and vscode
这个设置把右边键盘控制的破坏了] map keypad_4(Home in niz micro 84 keyboard)  cmd+1 cmd+2 cmd+3 cmd+4  to    if not Chrome open chrome, else openVscode,     Chrome , Vscode ,iTerm
map numpad num_pad 7 9 to scroll up down
r_command+h to hide(command+h)
right_command + left_command to command+click
map capslock(right_shift) + a to click then select all
map f1 to command + 1
map f2 to shift ctrl + tab
map f3 to ctrl + tab
map f4 to escape
right_command+ tab to right-click(mouse button 2)
rightcommand to cmd + v when hold tlide
right_command + ;(:) to active scroll(control+r) in vimac
right_command+ wsad to cursor move
shift + capslock( capslock + shift ) to option + capslock
Map capslock+w to click then command+w
capslock(right_shift)+c to click then command+a then command + c
Map capslock(right_shift)+down to option+down
Map capslock(right_shift)+up to option+up
Map capslock(right_shift)+right to option+right
Map capslock(right_shift)+left to option+left
Caps_lock capslock + i l to scroll up down
Caps_lock capslock + j k to command + 2 command + 3 to NextTab and PreiviousTab
Map capslock(right_shift)+del to option+del
Map Chrome Devtools debug shortcuts
Change shift+cmd+8 to command+F8 in Chrome dev (to de/active breakpoints)
control+ option + h to delete
RShift to contrlSpace
Tap Command_R (⌘) → Switch input source to Chinese  |  短按右 Command (⌘) → 切换到中文输入法
map LeftOption to command + x
Double tap left_option to esc,map LeftOption to shift + command + 2
Tap Command_L (⌘) → Switch input source to English  |  短按左 Command (⌘) → 切换到英文输入法
Change fn to dblclick when used alone
Change left_control + x to command + w when used in Chrome
Change left_control + space to command + l when used in Chrome
Change left_control + space to command + l when used in Chrome
Change left_control to control + f when used alone in vscode
Change left_control to command + l when used alone in Chrome
ROption to ctrl+Space
cmd+semicolon to acrtiveHint in vimac (f17
command+semicolon to semicolon
r_shift+semicolon to Scroll in vimac(ctrl r
Change fn+c to dblclick and command + c
Change fn+d to dblclick and command + d
Change fn+f to dblclick and command + f
Change fn+v to dblclick and command + v
option + / or fn + / to commnand + / for comment in code
ctrl + f to shift + command + f when VSCode
ctrl + r to shift + command + r when VSCode
cmd+t to cmd+t and change Inputsource when  in  Chrome
cmd+l to cmd+l and change Inputsource when  in  Chrome
如果不是chrome和chromium，capslock映射到打开Chrome，否则是command+t
在chrome和chromium，capslock映射到cmd+t。（如果是中文就先切换到英文输入法）
l_option + backslash to backslash.
option + t to open iTerm.app
option + t to open iTerm.app
option + e to open textEdit.app
Change right_shift+e to pageDown
Change right_shift+r to pageUp
Change right_shift+g to end
Change right_shift+f to home
Remap option+h/j/k/l to arrow keys in VSCode
grave click items
shift+command+esc to option 5 times
map escape to command+tab
Change shift+spacebar to f17
Change r_shift+w to close that tab
Change r_shift+c to click and copy
Change r_shift+v to click and paste
Change r_shift+h to click and hide
Change r_shift+m to minimize that app
Change r_shift+q to quit that app
map f4  to escape
map cmd command+f11 to brightnesss down
map cmd command+f12 to brightnesss up
map shift+option+cmd+f11 to shift+option+brightness_decrement
map shift+option+cmd+f12 to shift+option+brightness_increment
map cmd command+f10 to open Music.app ,again to hide
map control+f11 to (cmd)command+volume_decrement for 'volume control'
map control+f12 to (cmd)command+volume_increment for 'volume control'
map cmd+f5 to scroll right
map cmd+f6 to scroll left
map f5 to scroll down
map f6 to scroll up
option + c to command+d then command+c
map eject to shift command option control p(in BTT to open finder)
